body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Frank Mitchell and I'm with City Fuel Co. How can I assist you today? May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Frank. My name is Diana Jenkins.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diana. Before we proceed, could you kindly provide me with your phone number and your city of residence for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - two three four - one two three four, and I reside in Oakville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diana. How can I assist you further today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question about the gas station services. How often are your pumps inspected for safety?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Our pumps are inspected every six months to ensure safety compliance. Is there anything else you'd like to know, Diana?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, do you offer any loyalty programs for frequent customers?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Yes, Diana, we do have a loyalty program that offers discounts and rewards for our frequent customers. Thank you for your questions and time today. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out to us again. Have a great day.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting us, Diana. Have a great day!
